verbose_text: EMT was directly induced using TGF-beta1 in RLE-6TN cells cultured under normal conditions, while it was not induced by stimulating Runx3 overexpressing RLE-6TN cells with TGF-beta1; specifically, epithelial cell markers were still highly expressed in the Runx3 + TGF-beta1 group.
evidence: EMT was directly induced using TGF-beta1
